alp: Ranked by its country name alphabetically - #1 Afghanistan, #194 Zimbabwe
pop: How many people in a country - #1 China, #194 Nauru
area: Size of a country, - #1 Russia #194 Monaco
den: Population / Area of a country - #1 Monaco, #194 Mongolia
gdp: Gross Domestic Product of a country in US Dollars in 2020 - #1 USA, #194 Tuvalu
gdpc: Gross Domestic Product / Population of a country - #1 Liechtenstein, #194 Somalia
alpc: Ranked by its capital city alphabetically - #1 United Arab Emirates (Abu Dhabi), #194 Croatia (Zagreb)
latt: Position of the capital from the North pole southwards - #1 Iceland, #194 Tuvalu
long: Position of the capital from the anti/180th meridian (opposite of the prime meridian) eastwards - #1 Tonga, #194 Tuvalu
grow: Average annual rate of population change between 2015-2020 - #1 Bahrain #194 Lithuania
high: Average height above sea level - #1 Tajikistan #194 Bahamas
